name: Dungeon (Ruchir B)
description:
Dungeon is a game where you conquer a dungeon. Why? Well, that's up to you to find out. Find story logs hidden throughout the dungeon to figure out your true purpose for coming here. Use your bow and arrow to solve puzzles and get to the heart of the dungeon to find what you're looking for.

Controls:

W is used to move forward.

A is used to move to the left.

S is used to move backward.

D is used to move to the right.

To dash, hold shift while moving with WASD. To jump, press the spacebar.

To interact with posters and plaques, press E.

Look around with the mouse, right-click to draw an arrow, and left-click to fire it.

Game was made by Ruchir B., Harrison A., Jack W., and Elijah V.
